vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and (1) an ordinance granting a Planned Development District for MU-1 Mixed Use District uses; (2) an ordinance granting the termination of Specific Use Permit No. 891 for an establishment for the care of alcoholic, narcotic, and psychiatric patients; and (3) a resolution accepting the termination of the existing deed restrictions [Z823-227] on property zoned an MF-1(A) Multifamily District on the west line of University Hills Boulevard, northwest of the intersection of East Wheatland Road and University Hills Boulevard
Recommendation of Staff: Approval, subject to a development plan and conditions 
Recommendation of CPC: Approval, subject to a development plan and conditions 
Z212-161(MP)
